name: Sufoco
description:
In Sufoco you control Claus and his copies, simultaneously, through stone corridors and caves while evading the spike stones that are falling from the ceiling until they find each other or reach a safe spot from the hazards. The stages will make this meeting gradually more difficult and challenge your sense of priority and space awareness. This version of the game includes:
  • Local co-op multiplayer, the second player controls the copy, with controller compatibility.
  • 50 Stages.
  • Two game modes, Normal and Permanent Death.
